bill_title: to require that certain recreational vehicles display a vehicle identification number.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require that certain recreational vehicles display a vehicle identification number. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-3 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any new recreational vehicle shall display a permanently affixed vehicle identification number. The vehicle identification number shall be stamped, imprinted, or embossed on a plate which shall be located in a conspicuous location on the frame for easy access to law enforcement personnel and other interested parties. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
